TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTable/HtmlTableRowControlCollection extends System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

summary.span: Representa uma coleção de objetos que são as linhas de um controle .

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are the rows of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O classe representa uma coleção de objetos para um controle.The class represents a collection of objects for an control. Controles podem ser adicionados ao final da coleção com o método, ou em um local de índice especificado na coleção com o método.Controls can be added at the end of the collection with the method, or at a specified index location in the collection with the method. Somente controles do tipo podem ser adicionados para o coleção.Only controls of type can be added to the collection. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um personalizado que substitui o método para que quando linhas são adicionadas a uma tabela, elas sempre sejam adicionadas no início da coleção de linhas da tabela.The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom that overrides the method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Web.UI.Control child) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Add (child As Control)

span.span: The to add to the collection.

summary.span: Adiciona o objeto especificado à coleção.

span.span: Adds the specified object to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O controle adicionado só pode ser um controle; caso contrário, um exceção será lançada.The added control can only be an control; otherwise, an exception is thrown. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um personalizado coleção que substitui o método para que quando linhas são adicionadas a uma tabela, elas sempre sejam adicionadas no início da coleção de linhas da tabela.The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom collection that overrides the method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. Observe como personalizado chamadas de método da classe base método com o `index` parâmetro igual a 0.Notice how the custom method calls the base class's method with the `index` parameter equal to 0. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

exception.span: O controle adicionado deve ser do tipo .

span.span: The added control must be of type .
